fps.description: Expected framerate of QR code scanning

qrbox.description: The dimensions for the QR scanning area. If not set, the entire area of the video stream will be used by the scanner.

aspectRatio.description: The aspect ratio for the video.

disableFlip.description: Disable the ability to scan QR codes that have been flipped.

inactiveByDefault.description: Determines whether or not the scanner is started when it is mounted.

formatsToSupport.description: List of Html5QrcodeSupportedFormats to support. See more.

style.description: Custom css properties to apply to scanner block.

onScan.description: Trigger actions when code is scanned.
